headline: Oil prices drop as Trump signals de-escalation in Iran crisis
summary: Investing.com -- Oil prices fell Wednesday after President Donald Trump indicated that executions in Iran have ceased, easing geopolitical tensions that had previously supported crude prices.

headline: TD Cowen is Bullish on Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL)
summary: Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) is among the 7 Best Beauty Stocks to Buy Right Now. headline: What happens to oil if Iran closes the Strait of Hormuz?
summary: Investing.com -- A closure of the Strait of Hormuz would trigger a “dramatic” shock to global oil markets and shipping, according to Kepler Cheuvreux in a note on Wednesday.
